summary: This document is a chronological log entry from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, detailing the transfer of Jeffrey Epstein to psychological observation on July 24, 2019, and the staffing assignments for his watch. It covers the period from July 23 to July 30, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The inmate who was transferred to psychological observation at MCC New York on July 24, 2019, and was under a watch companion detail.

events.title: Watch Companion Assumes Duty
events.description: An I/M (Inmate) companion assumed duties for Jeffrey Epstein's watch from staff at 7:00 am.

events.title: Epstein Transferred to Psych Observation
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was transferred to psychological observation at 8:45 am, where he remained until July 30, 2019, at 8:15 am, with a WM (Watch Movement) companion utilized.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was transferred to psychological observation at MCC New York on July 24, 2019, at 8:45 am.
Epstein remained in psychological observation until July 30, 2019, at 8:15 am.
The log indicates the use of both an 'I/M companion' and a 'WM companion' for Epstein's watch during this period.
The document is marked as 'CONFIDENTIAL' and is associated with the Southern District of New York (SDNY).
The log covers a critical period just weeks before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
